languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс притягивает вас к себе. Его руки все еще холодные, а тело трясет от мелкой дрожи.{/n} "Рядом. Мы рядом. Это все, что мне нужно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс притягивает вас к себе. Его руки все еще холодные, а тело трясет от мелкой дрожи.{/n} "Рядом. Мы рядом. Это все, что мне нужно".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix draws you to him. His hands are still cold and his body is shaking slightly.{/n} "Together. We're together. That is all I need."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс притягивает вас к себе. Его руки все еще холодные, а тело трясет от мелкой дрожи.{/n} "Рядом. Мы рядом. Это все, что мне нужно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix draws you to him. His hands are still cold and his body is shaking slightly.{/n} "Together. We're together. That is all I need."
{n}Heinrix draws you to him. His hands are still cold and his body is shaking slightly.{/n} "Together. We're together. That is all I need."
{n}Heinrix draws you to him. His hands are still cold and his body is shaking slightly.{/n} "Together. We're together. That is all I need."
{n}Heinrix draws you to him. His hands are still cold and his body is shaking slightly.{/n} "Together. We're together. That is all I need."

languages.text: {n}海因里希将你拥入怀中。他的双手依然冰冷，身体也在微微颤抖。{/n}“在一起，和你在一起。这就是我唯一想要的东西。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix draws you to him. His hands are still cold and his body is shaking slightly.{/n} "Together. We're together. That is all I need."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希将你拥入怀中。他的双手依然冰冷，身体也在微微颤抖。{/n}“在一起，和你在一起。这就是我唯一想要的东西。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix te atrae a él. Tiene las manos heladas y le tiembla todo el cuerpo.{/n} «Juntos. Estamos juntos. Eso es todo lo que necesito».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix draws you to him. His hands are still cold and his body is shaking slightly.{/n} "Together. We're together. That is all I need."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix te atrae a él. Tiene las manos heladas y le tiembla todo el cuerpo.{/n} «Juntos. Estamos juntos. Eso es todo lo que necesito».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスがあなたを引き寄せる。彼の手はまだ冷たく、体はわずかに震えている。{/n}「一緒に。一緒にいる。それだけでいいんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix draws you to him. His hands are still cold and his body is shaking slightly.{/n} "Together. We're together. That is all I need."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスがあなたを引き寄せる。彼の手はまだ冷たく、体はわずかに震えている。{/n}「一緒に。一緒にいる。それだけでいいんだ」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous attire à lui. Ses mains sont toujours froides et son corps est agité de tremblements.{/n} « Ensemble. Nous sommes ensemble. C'est tout ce dont j'ai besoin. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix draws you to him. His hands are still cold and his body is shaking slightly.{/n} "Together. We're together. That is all I need."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous attire à lui. Ses mains sont toujours froides et son corps est agité de tremblements.{/n} « Ensemble. Nous sommes ensemble. C'est tout ce dont j'ai besoin. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix zieht dich zu sich. Seine Hände sind immer noch kalt und sein Körper zittert leicht.{/n} "Zusammen. Wir sind zusammen. Mehr brauche ich nicht."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix draws you to him. His hands are still cold and his body is shaking slightly.{/n} "Together. We're together. That is all I need."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix zieht dich zu sich. Seine Hände sind immer noch kalt und sein Körper zittert leicht.{/n} "Zusammen. Wir sind zusammen. Mehr brauche ich nicht."

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix draws you to him. His hands are still cold and his body is shaking slightly.{/n} "Together. We're together. That is all I need."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix seni kendine çekiyor. Elleri hâlâ soğuk, bedeni hafifçe titriyor.{/n} "Birlikteyiz. Biz birlikteyiz. Tek ihtiyacım olan bu."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix draws you to him. His hands are still cold and his body is shaking slightly.{/n} "Together. We're together. That is all I need."
